answers.answer: There is absolutely nothing wrong with a Type 2 using Insulin.  And I am not a Dr. but you might want to increase those amounts.  Test your Sugars before each meal and test 2-3 hours after the meal.  If you are normal after the meals you are using the right amounts of Insulin.  If not then you might want to increase it slightly but I would talk to your Dr. first.  Also I would think that the Insulin should be taken BEFORE the meal but check with your Dr. on that.

title: Diabetic insulin
